620990.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Undying (Token Pack)
620990.description:
The Undying

This token pack contains 28 tokens. This pack contains a variety of ghosts and undead creatures.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Animated Armor
  • Blue Dragon Golem
  • 2 Death Masters
  • Demon Ivy Dark
  • Ghost
  • Ghost Dwarf
  • 2 Ghouls
  • Hell Mare
  • Lich Lord
  • Lich Purple
  • Ravenous Canibal
  • Skeletal Hound
  • Skeleton
  • Undead Alchemist
  • 5 Vampire Lords
  • Vampire Lord Armor Mount
  • Vampire Lord Hell Mare
  • 2 Zombies
  • Dragon Shadow
  • Vampire Hydra
  • Vampire Beast
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
